Attribute.Name: Weed Common Name
Attribute.ValueTemplate:
<derive expr="{ weedList := MULTIVALUE2LIST(PRODVAL('ec6c2ecd-bd83-457c-85e5-5770dbe5b4dc')), isBroadleaf := OR( LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Alfalfa"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Asiatic Jasmine"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Beggarweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bermuda Buttercup"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bindweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bitter Cress"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bittersweet Nightshade"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Black Clover"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Black Medic"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Blue Violet"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Broadleaf Plantain"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Buckhorn Plantain"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bulbous Buttercup"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bull Thistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bur Clover"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Burweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Canada Thistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Card Thistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Celandine"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Chamberbitter"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Chicory"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Cinquefoil"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Clover"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Coast Dandelion"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Cocklebur"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Common Burdock"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Common Chickweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Creeping Bellflower"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Creeping Charlie"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Creeping Veronica"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Crown Vetch"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dandelion"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Day Flower"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dead Nettle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dichondra"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dog Fennel"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dollarweed Lawn Pennywort"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dwarf Dandelion"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"English Ivy"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"English Lawn Daisy"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"False Dandelion"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Field Bindweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Florida Betony"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Florida Pusley"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Garlic Mustard"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Giant Hogweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Goatshead"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Goutweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Greenbriar"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Ground Ivy"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Hawkweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Heal All"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Henbit"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Horseweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Ironweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Japanese Clover"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Japanese Knotweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Knapweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Knotweed (Prostrate)"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Kudzu"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Lambsquarters"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Lespedeza"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Love Vine"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Mallow"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Marestail"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Matchweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Milkweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Morning Glory"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Mouse-Ear Chickweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Mugwort"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Mullein"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Multiflora Rose"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Mustard"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Narrowleaf Plantain"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Nettle Hedge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Oxalis"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Pacysandra"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Pennywort"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Periwinkle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Pigweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Plantain"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Poison Hemlock"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Poison Ivy"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Poison Oak"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Poison Sumac"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Pokeweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Potato Vine (Dioscorea Bulbifera)"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Prostrate Spurge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Puncture Vine"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Purslane"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Queen Annes Lace"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Ragweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Red Clover"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Red Henbit"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Red Sorrel"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Russain Thistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sand Brier"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sandspur"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sedge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sedum"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Shepherds Purse"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Smartweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Snow on the Mountain"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sourgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sowthistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sow Thistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Speedwell"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Spotted Spurge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Spurge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Spurweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"St. Johns Wort"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Stinging Nettle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Tall Buttercup"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Tansy"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Thistle"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Three Leaved Ivy"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Tree Seedling"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Trumpet Creeper"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Tumbleweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Virginia Buttonweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Virginia Creeper"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"White Dutch Clover"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Carrot"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Grape"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Morning Glory"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Onion"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Rose"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Strawberry"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Violet"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wisteria"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wood Sorrel")),
isGrassy := OR( LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Annual Bluegrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Annual Ryegrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bahia Grass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bamboo"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Barnyardgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Bermuda Grass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Broadleaf Signal Grass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Broom Sedge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Buffalograss"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Carpetgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Cattails"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Centipede Grass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Cheatgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Coarse Fescue"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Crabgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Dallisgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Foxtails"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Goosegrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Green Kyllinga"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Horsetail"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Indian Chickweed"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Kikuyu Grass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Kyllinga"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Monkey Grass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Moss"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Mosses, Liverworts, and Algae"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Nimblewill"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Nutsedge"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Orchardgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Phragmites"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Poa Annua"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Poa Trivalis"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Quackgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Sandbur"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Seedheads in Lawn"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Smooth Crabgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Tall Fescue"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Torpedograss"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Watergrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wheatgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Garlic"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wild Onion"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Wiregrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Yellow Nutgrass"), LISTCONTAINS(weedList,"Zoysiagrass")),
outPut := IF(AND(isBroadleaf,isGrassy),"Broadleaf and Grassy", IF(isBroadleaf,"Broadleaf", IF(isGrassy,"Grassy",""))) } trim(outPut)"/>
